Chicago.Park Tower (Chicago): Park Tower, located at 800 North Michigan Avenue in Chicago, in the U.S. state of Illinois, is a skyscraper that was completed in 2000. At 844 feet (257 meters) tall with 70 floors — 67 floors for practical use, it is the twelfth-tallest building in Chicago, the 43rd-tallest building in the United States, and the 83rd-tallest in the world by architectural detail. It is one of the world's tallest buildings to be clad with architectural precast concrete (the Transamerica Pyramid Building in San Francisco is taller).
